import { ThumbUpIcon, ThumbDownIcon, EyeIcon } from "@heroicons/react/solid"; import { Link } from "react-router-dom"; import { fetchPostsAction } from "../../redux/slices/posts/postSlices"; import {useEffect} from 'react'; import {useDispatch , useSelector} from 'react-redux'; export default function PostsList() { //dispatch const dispatch =useDispatch(); useEffect(()=>{dispatch(fetchPostsAction()); },[dispatch]); //select posts from store const post=useSelector(state=>state?.post); const {postLists, loading, appErr, serverErr } =post; console.log(postLists, loading, appErr, serverErr ); return ( <>
